ValidationRule.description: EPH-1913, US-0007080 US-0009506 - NA Deals: DWH Contacts conflicts US-0011343 - restore contact of LinkAccount. added RT
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EBH_DWH', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', NOT(ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Available_for_GCX__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Accepted_Current_Deals_Agreement__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED( Primary_Contact__c )), NOT(ISCHANGED( EBH_Decision_Maker_Role__c )), NOT(ISCHANGED( Contact_Role__c )), NOT(ISCHANGED(EBH_DoNotContact__c)) ) && NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This contact can not be changed
